p: P. minus leaves were collected from Haji Hussin Markom Sdn. Bhd farm near Rawang, Selangor, Malaysia (3.3453364° N 101.593589° E). P. minus was then authenticated at the Institutional Herbarium Department, Faculty of Science and Technology, Universiti Kebangsaan Malaysia (No. UKMB40332). Fresh entire leaves (10 kg) of P. minus were subjected to hydrodistillation with 40 L of distilled water for 8 hours using a Clevenger-type apparatus as described previously (Ahmad et al., 2014[ 2]). Essential oil was collected over distilled water, separated, and dried over nitrogen gas prior to storage in dark at 4 °C.
